  /* VHX */
  .fullwidth {
  	max-width: 100%;
  }
  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  	font-family: 'Lato','Open Sans',sans-serif;
    font-weight: 300;
  }
  .text-center { text-align: center; }
  .uppercase { text-transform: uppercase; }
  .hidden { display: none !important; }
  .padding-top { padding-top: 3em; }
  .padding-bottom { padding-bottom: 3em; }
  a, a:active {
  	color: #0877d9;
  }
  a:hover {
  	color: #0877d9;
  }
  .section-title {
  	padding: 3em 0;
  }
  .section {
  	padding-bottom: 5em;
    position: relative;
  }
  .coloroverlay {
  	position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    opacity: .5;
    z-index: -1;
  }
  .dynamic-bg {
  	
  }
  .button {
  	display: inline-block;
    padding: 5px 10px;
    border: 2px solid #000;
    -webkit-border-radius: 4px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    color: #000;
    font-weight: 300;
    text-transform: uppercase;
  }
  
  .button:hover {
  	border: 2px solid #0877d9;
    color: #000;
  }
  
  
  
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  /* HEADER */
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  nav {
  	border-bottom: 2px solid ;
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: 100;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-align: center;
    background-color: #FFF;
  }
  nav h3 {
  	font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: bold;
    display: inline;
    margin-right: 10px;
  }
  nav a,
  nav a:visited {
  	text-transform: uppercase;
    color: #000;
  	padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Lato',sans-serif;
    font-weight: 100;
    display: inline-block;
  }
  nav a:active,
  nav a:focus {
  	color: #000;
  }
  nav a:hover {
  	color: #000;
    background-color: #0877d9;
  }
  nav.headroom {
    -webkit-transition: transform 200ms linear;
    -moz-transition: transform 200ms linear;
    -ms-transition: transform 200ms linear;
    -o-transition: transform 200ms linear;
    transition: transform 200ms linear;
  }
  nav.headroom--pinned {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(0%);
    -moz-transform: translateY(0%);
    -o-transform: translateY(0%);
    -ms-transform: translateY(0%);
    transform: translateY(0%);
  }
  nav.headroom--unpinned {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-100%);
    -moz-transform: translateY(-100%);
    -o-transform: translateY(-100%);
    -ms-transform: translateY(-100%);
    transform: translateY(-100%);
  }
  @media only screen and (max-width: 40em) { 
  	nav a {
    	font-size: 12px;
    }
    nav h3 {
    	font-size: 12px;
      display: block;
    }
  }
  
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  /* NOTHING FOR SALE */
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  .intro {
  	padding-top: 5em;
  }
  
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  /* MAILING LIST */
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  .signup {
  	text-align: left;
  }
  .signup form {
  
  }
  .signup .form-title {
  	text-align: left;
    margin-left: 5px;
    font-size: 18px;
  }
  .signup input[type='email'] {
  	-webkit-appearance: none;
    border: none;
    padding: 13px 10px;
    font-family: 'Lato',sans-serif;
    font-weight: 100;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #CCC;
  }
  .signup input[type='submit'] {
  	-webkit-appearance: none;
    border: 0px;
    background: transparent;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 13px 15px;
    border: 2px solid #000;
    -webkit-border-radius: 10px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    color: #000;
    font-weight: 300;
    text-transform: uppercase;
  }
  .signup input[type='submit']:hover {
  	border: 2px solid #0877d9;
    color: #000;
  }
  .form.error input[type='submit'] {
  	border: 2px solid #f00;
  }
  .form.error input[type='email'] {
  	border-bottom: 1px solid #F00;
  }
  
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  /* TOP */
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  .trailer {
  	position: relative;  
    margin-bottom: 80px;
  }
  .trailer .image {
  	background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center center;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    z-index: 1;
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -moz-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -ms-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -o-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    transition: all .3s ease-in;
  }
  .trailer .image.is-active {
  	opacity: 1;
  }
  .trailer .image .coloroverlay {
  	position: absolute;
  }
  .trailer .image .overlay i {
  	position: relative;
  	top: 50%;
  	-webkit-transform: translateY(-50%);
  	-moz-transform: translateY(-50%);
  	-o-transform: translateY(-50%);
  	-ms-transform: translateY(-50%);
  	transform: translateY(-50%);
  }
  .trailer.padded {
  	padding: 80px 0 0 0;
  }
  .trailer .package-sharp {
  	position: relative;
    z-index: 20;
  	top: 80px;
  }
  .trailer .playback {
  	position: relative;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    height: 0;
    padding-top: 56.25%;
  }
  .trailer .playback img {
  	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    border-radius: 3px;
     -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -moz-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -ms-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -o-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    transition: all .3s ease-in;
  }
  .bottomshadow:after {
  		content: "";
      width: 98%;
      height: 1px;
      bottom: 0px;
      left: 1%;
      display: block;
      position: absolute;
      z-index: -1;
  
      -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.4);
         -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.4);
              box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.4);
  }
  
  .trailer .playback a {
  	position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    display: block;
     -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -moz-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -ms-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -o-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    transition: all .3s ease-in;
    overflow: hidden;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    border-radius: 3px;
  }
  .trailer .playback a .overlay {
  	opacity: 0;
  	position: absolute;
  	top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    z-index: 10;
     -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in;
    -moz-transition: all .3s ease-in;

	  	<section class="updates section padding-top" id="updates">
	    	<h4 class="section-title text-center uppercase">Updates</h4>
	      <div class="row">
	      	<div class="small-16 medium-8 large-9 columns primary">
	        	<ul>
	            <li>
	            	<h2 class="title"><a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv">A Conference Unlike Any Other</a></h2>
	              <h4 class="meta"><a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv">Jun 08, 2017</a></h4>
	              <div class="header">
	              	<a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv"><img src="https://dr56wvhu2c8zo.cloudfront.net/thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett/assets/051367c6-4ffc-42e7-8080-49c128c42b68.JPG"></a>
	              </div>
	            	<div class="post-body">
		              <p>Hi Family,</p><p>Just an update to say Thankyou for your continued support of CGM. &nbsp;</p><p>We launched the first Touring Session this past month at The Rock Church in San Diego, California.&nbsp;</p><p>This is a conference unlike other conferences in that discussion is a big part of the teaching for me. &nbsp;If you would love to see a Cynthia Garrett&nbsp;Touring Sessions Conference at your church tell your leadership to send an information request and we will try and schedule a stop in your town or city today!</p><p>Lotsa Love & Prayers,</p><p>Cynthia&nbsp;</p>
	              </div>
	            </li>
	            <li>
	            	<h2 class="title"><a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv">This Prayer Is For YOU!</a></h2>
	              <h4 class="meta"><a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv">Mar 11, 2017</a></h4>
	              <div class="header">
	              	<a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv"><img src="https://dr56wvhu2c8zo.cloudfront.net/thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett/assets/d6b6e905-2f4d-4491-aaa1-3190206fcd72.JPG"></a>
	              </div>
	            	<div class="post-body">
		              <p>Hello Cynthia Garrett Ministries Family&nbsp;</p><p>Just thanking God for each of you and want you to know that this morning I am interceding on behalf of every CGM Follower. &nbsp;</p><p>I&nbsp;pray the favor of God and the mercy of God over your life and that of your family. I pray you will be blessed with the desires of your heart. &nbsp;And, I pray that today is a great day and tonight is a beautiful night filled with peace and joy after a blessed day. &nbsp;As you sleep please pray for me and for this ministry and our efforts to grow. &nbsp;</p><p>Today God took me to Esther 4:4-17 and reminded me once again of the Esther calling on my life. I sincerely believe he is calling forth women for such a time as this. I believe he wants us women to step into our roles in a way that is positive and godly. To do so, we must be clear about our identity as daughters of the living God.&nbsp;&nbsp;Let me repeat this critical statement...We must be clear about our identity as daughters of the living God!!!</p><p>Please help me continue to teach this important message by example, by witness, and through my work. &nbsp;I thank each and every one of you for your support of this ministry. &nbsp;Your emails, your follows, your likes, and your financial partnership are our life line. Today, would you please share this message and invite a friend to register here with their email so I can share and communicate His love with them. &nbsp;</p><p>Please add us to your prayers and you will be helping us grow in every way and continue to change the narrative of Christian media today. &nbsp;Let our lives be a living witness of His love and grace because we know how to walk out our faith powerfully!.&nbsp;</p><p>To God Be The Glory,</p><p>Cynthia&nbsp;</p>
	              </div>
	            </li>
	            <li>
	            	<h2 class="title"><a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv">March Madness</a></h2>
	              <h4 class="meta"><a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv">Mar 08, 2017</a></h4>
	              <div class="header">
	              	<a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv"><img src="https://dr56wvhu2c8zo.cloudfront.net/thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett/assets/539ce46b-1753-4732-a7b7-7de4fadebee9/IMG_2532.JPG"></a>
	              </div>
	            	<div class="post-body">
		              <p>Hi All,</p><p>It's been raining like crazy in California and finally the sun is out! &nbsp;It's amazing how much the sunshine does for my mood. &nbsp;It's like God bursting through the darkness with the promise of a better, warmer, brighter, day. &nbsp;It makes me realize though the need to remember that God is in the rain. He's in the cloudy, cold, days that seem dark and bleak. &nbsp;Even when we feel like He's not. He is. &nbsp;I hope you'll lean on Him and embrace Him no matter what season of your life you're in and no matter how dark the clouds look today. &nbsp;He is with you. &nbsp;Thanks for following me and for cheering on the growth of this ministry &nbsp;</p><p>I'm headed to London in April to film more Mini Sessions and this season we will feature some awesome guests on the couch with me! &nbsp;Also, in May I'm back in South Africa preaching at Rhema Ministries for the first ever National South African Young Adults Conference. &nbsp;It started as just an idea and now May 5, 6, & 7 is a huge reality! &nbsp;If you're in the area please come join the fun. I'm turning the cameras and Mic's on all my South African young people with things to say and share. It's going to be amazing!!!!</p><p>I'd like to invite you all to partner with me monthly so we can continue to grow and provide media content that teaches, shares, and glorifies our faith in a way that is powerful and relevant for women...and men...today!</p><p>Your $5 $10 $25 or even $100 monthly gift to CGM goes a long, long, way and I need your help to take us to the next level. Just go to DONATE on the CGM site now.&nbsp;</p><p><a href="http://www.cynthiagarrett.org/donate/">http://www.cynthiagarrett.org/donate/</a></p><p>Thankyou All & Bless You,</p><p><em><strong>Cynthia</strong></em>&nbsp;</p>
	              </div>
	            </li>
	            <li>
	            	<h2 class="title"><a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv">Happy New Year!</a></h2>
	              <h4 class="meta"><a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv">Jan 06, 2017</a></h4>
	              <div class="header">
	              	<a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv"><img src="https://dr56wvhu2c8zo.cloudfront.net/thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett/assets/9d5b5d50-0c25-4279-873b-b821ba371fdc/IMG_2225.JPG"></a>
	              </div>
	            	<div class="post-body">
		              <p>Hello Fam,</p><p>We are just a few days in but I hope 2017 is starting out well. &nbsp;We have some exciting things coming in 2017 and I ask for your prayers for continued growth and success in expanding our reach across the globe.</p><p>We will be launching on Christian networks here in the USA. More information on this exciting development is coming soon. &nbsp;We will also be adding some amazing conferences and appearances to the 2017 schedule. &nbsp;I can't wait to send you dates and updates on where you can join me for one day seminars and 2 and 3 day conference events with some exciting Guest speakers!</p><p>Please watch for the new CGM Blog that will replace the PROOF Magazine forum. I have some amazing young women who will be highlighted in this new year as they share their voices and lessons with all of us.&nbsp;</p><p>Lastly, for any of you in the Los Angeles California area I will be appearing to sign books 📚 and to read a chapter from my new book <strong>PRODIGAL DAUGHTER: A Journey Home To Identity</strong> on Monday January 9th, 2017. We will begin and end with music from an incredible worship leader from The Rock Church in San Diego as well as prayer and great fellowship! &nbsp;To get your copy on Amazon USA just click the link below.</p><p><a href="https://www.amazon.com/Prodigal-Daughter-Journey-Home-Identity/dp/0692770933">https://www.amazon.com/Prodigal-Daughter-Journey-H...</a></p><p>Happy New Year friends and thankyou for all your love, support, and encouragement. &nbsp;Please let me know how I can pray for you. You are the success of this ministry.&nbsp;</p><p>Love & Blessings love&nbsp;</p><p>Cynthia&nbsp;</p>
	              </div>
	            </li>
	            <li>
	            	<h2 class="title"><a href="http://thelondonsessionswithcynthiagarrett.vhx.tv">Just Sharing....Who Are You?</a></h2>

	              </div>
	            	<div class="post-body">
		              <p>Hi Family,&nbsp;</p><p>Just wanted to share an interview that just came out on the topic of Identity. Hope you'll read, pray, and be blessed. &nbsp;<a href="https://4wordwomen.org/who-are-you/">https://4wordwomen.org/who-are-you/</a></p><p>Merry Christmas to all of you! &nbsp;Love & prayers for an incredible journey through 2017!&nbsp;</p><p>❤️ &nbsp;</p><p>Cynthia &nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

      init: function() {

      _setupMailingList: function(){
      	// set source to this location
        $(".mailing-list input[name='subscription[source]']").val(location.href);
    		// vars
        var $all_forms = $('.mailing-list form');
        var $all_form_titles = $('.mailing-list .form-title');
    
    		// email focus
        $('.mailing-list input[type="email"]').focus(function(){
          $all_forms.removeClass("error");
          $all_forms.find("input[type='submit']").prop('disabled',false);
        });
    
         // setup submit button
         $(".submit-on-click").click(function(ev){
           ev.preventDefault();
           $(this).parent("form").trigger('submit');
         });
    
         $all_forms.on('submit', function(ev){
          ev.preventDefault();
    
          var email = $(this).find(".email").val();
          
          // very rudimentary email checking
          if (!email){
            $(this).addClass("error");
            $(this).find('input[type="email"]').attr("placeholder","Enter a valid email");
          } else {
            var at_location = email.indexOf("@");
            var dot_location = email.indexOf(".",at_location);
            if (at_location < 0 && dot_location < 0){
              $all_forms.addClass("error");
              $(this).find('input[type="email"]').attr("placeholder","Enter a valid email");
            }
          }
    
          // no errors, proceed to submit data
          if (!$(this).hasClass("error")){
    
            $(this).find('input[type="submit"]').prop('disabled', true);
            $.ajax({
              type: "POST",
              url: $(this).prop('action'),
              crossDomain: true,
              xhrFields: { withCredentials: true },
              data: $(this).serialize(),
              dataType: 'json',
              success: function(){
                $all_forms.fadeOut();
                $all_form_titles.html("Thank you!");
              },
              error: function(){
                $(this).parents(".form").addClass("error");
                $(this).find('input[type="email"]').attr("placeholder","Please try again");
              }
            });
    
          } // no error
    
         }); // FORM SUBMITS
        // submit form

            "offset": 205,
            "tolerance": 5,
            "classes": {

            }
          });
          headroom.init();
        }

      _slideToAnchors: function(){
      	// slide to anchors
         $('a[href*=#]:not([href=#])').click(function() {
          if (location.pathname.replace(/^\//,'') == this.pathname.replace(/^\//,'') && location.hostname == this.hostname) {
            var target = $(this.hash);
            target = target.length ? target : $('[name=' + this.hash.slice(1) +']');
            if (target.length) {
              $('html,body').animate({
                scrollTop: target.offset().top - 40
              }, 1000);
              return false;
            }
          }
        });

            $(".image").addClass("is-active");
          }
    		});
      },
      inArray: function(needle, haystack) {
        var length = haystack.length;
        for(var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
            if(haystack[i] == needle) return true;
        }
        return false;

      _fadeInBG: function() {

      _theaters: {
          init: function(theList) {
            var jqxhr = $.get(theList, function(data) {
              VHXJS._theaters.process(data);
            });
          },
          process: function(data){
          	
            dataChunk = CSVToArray(data,",");
    
            if (dataChunk.length > 1){
            	VHXJS._theaters.display(dataChunk);
            } else {
            	VHXJS._theaters.noShows();
            }
          },
          processDate: function(dateStr){
          	// format: 2/24/2014
            var monthsArray = Array("Jan","Feb","Mar","Apr","May","June","July","Aug","Sept","Oct","Nov","Dec");
            var adate = dateStr.split("/");
            var themonth = adate[0] - 1;
            var theday = adate[1];
            var theyear = adate[2];
            
            var prettyDisplay = monthsArray[themonth] + " " + theday  + ", " + theyear;
            return prettyDisplay;
          },
          display: function(data){
    
            var eventTotal = data.length - 1;
            var eventHalf = Math.floor(eventTotal/2);
            var eventCounter = 0;
    				var typeArray = [];
            
            var prevdate ="";
            var displaydate = "";
            var dateissame = "";
            
            var thehtml = "";        
    
            for (var i=1;i<=data.length-1; i++){
             // 0 = start date
             // 1 = time
             // 2 = City, St
             // 3 = Venue
             // 4 = Info
             // 5 = Info Link
             // 6 = Ticket Link
             // 7 = Fcebook Link
      			 // 8 = event type label`
             var thedate = data[i][0];
             if (thedate.indexOf("/") > -1){
             	thedate = VHXJS._theaters.processDate(thedate);
             }
             if (prevdate == thedate){
              	displaydate = "&nbsp;"
                dateissame = "same-date";
             } else {
    	         	displaydate = thedate;
                dateissame = "";
             }
            
             var thetime = "";
             if (data[i][2]){
             	thetime = '<span class="thetime">'+data[i][1]+"</span>";
             } else {
             	thetime = '<span class="thetime"></span>';
             }
             var thedatetime = thedate + "&nbsp;" + thetime;
    				 
             var location = data[i][2];
             location = location.replace(/\"/g,"");
             var venue = data[i][3].replace("\"","");
             if (venue == ""){ venue = "&nbsp;"; }
             var info = data[i][4].replace(/\n/g, "<br />");
             var infolink = data[i][5];
             var infolinkalt ="";
             var infolinkbutton ="";
             var ticketlink = data[i][6];
             var facebooklink = data[i][7];
             
            
            // SETUP TAGS
             var listingtype = data[i][8];
             var listinglink = "";
             // do we have multiple tags?
             if (listingtype.indexOf(":") > 0){
              // explode to array
             	var listingArr = listingtype.split(":");
              // loop through to make HTML
              for (kk = 0; kk < listingArr.length; kk++) {
              	// do we have a link for this event?
              	if (infolink){
    	            listinglink += "<a href='"+infolink+"' target='_blank' class='eventtype' rel='"+listingArr[kk]+"'>"+listingArr[kk]+"</a>";
                } else {
              		listinglink += "<span class='eventtype' rel='"+listingArr[kk]+"'>"+listingArr[kk]+"</span>";
                }
              }
             // SINGLE TAG
             } else {
             	// do we have a link for this event?
             	if (infolink){
              	listinglink = "<a href='"+infolink+"' target='_blank' class='eventtype' rel='"+listingtype+"'>"+listingtype+"</a>";
             	} else {
    	          listinglink = "<span class='eventtype' rel='"+listingtype+"'>"+listingtype+"</span>";
              }
             }
             // no listing type? make sure the listinglink is nulled out
             if (listingtype = ""){
             	listinglink = "&nbsp;";
             }
             
             // PREP INFO BUTTON
             if (infolink){ 
             	// make a button and a "more info" link 
             	infolinkbutton = "<a href='"+infolink+"' class='button' target='_blank'>Info</a> "; 
              infolinkalt = "<a href='"+infolink+"' target='_blank'>Click for tickets and additional screenings</a>"; 
              
              info = info.replace('Click for tickets and additional screenings','<a href="'+infolink+' target="_blank">Click for tickets and additional screenings</a>');
             }
             //if (ticketlink){ ticketlink = "<a href='"+ticketlink+"' class='button' target='_blank'>Tickets</a> "; }
             //if (facebooklink){ facebooklink = "<a href='"+facebooklink+"' class='button' target='_blank'><i class='fa fa-facebook-square'></i></a>"; } else { facebooklink = " "; }
    				
    					// CREATE THE ROW OF HTML
              thehtml += '<div class="row single-listing '+listingtype+' '+dateissame+'">';
              thehtml += '  <div class="small-12 medium-2 large-2 columns date"><span>'+displaydate+'</span></div>';
              thehtml += '  <div class="small-12 medium-1 large-2 columns thetype">'+listinglink+'</div>';
              thehtml += '  <div class="small-12 medium-3 large-2 columns cityst"><span>'+location+'</span></div>';
              thehtml += '	<div class="small-12 medium-5 large-5 columns venue"><span>'+venue+'</span><span class="time">'+thetime+'</span><span class="info"> '+info+'</span></div>';
              thehtml += '  <div class="small-12 medium-1 large-1 columns links"><span>'+infolinkbutton+'</span></div>';
              thehtml += '</div>';
              
    			
              eventCounter++;
              prevdate = thedate;
    
            }
            //thehtml += "</div>";
           $("#nowplaying").html(thehtml).find(".row:last-child").addClass("last");
          },
          noShows: function(){
            $("#nowplaying").html('<div class="row"><div class="small-12">Sorry, no screenings at this time.</div></div>');
          }
       }
    };
